name: Fisty Smash
description:
Get ready for some awesome smashing shoot"em up FUN!!

Put on your best face and get ready to FISTY SMASH! This is a game about protecting the star portal gate from an onslaught of dark forces. 

The goal of each level is simple: protect the star portal gate from incoming hordes of enemies. Each enemy type has a different characteristic that makes it more challenging than others. Some are fast and hard to hit, while others are large and will shoot multiple projectiles towards the star portal gate. You'll need fast reflexes and quick thinking if you want to succeed!

Features
  • Collect Power-ups
  • Time attack battle system
  • Hi-score system
  • Stats Room
Controls

Main Menu 

Keyboard

  • W or S key to move select icon
  • X key to pick selection

-------------------------------------------------------------

Gamepad/Joystick

  • Left Analog stick to move select icon
  • X button to pick selection

In-Game

Keyboard Movement

  • W or up arrow to move
  • P key to pause

Restart Game

  • Press X key

Go back to main menu

  • Press Z key

--------------------------------------------------------------

Gamepad Movement

  • Left analog stick to move
  • Start/Menu to pause

Restart Game 

  • Press X button

Go back to main menu

  • Press Y button
